Name: Court-courthouse relationship
Description: This type connects courts to their courthouses, both current and historical.

Properties.Name: Court
Properties.Description: A court that heard cases in this courthouse.

Properties.Name: From date
Properties.Description: The date that this court first occupied this courthouse. If the court occupied this courthouse multiple, non-contiguous times, enter separate records for each.

Properties.Name: To date
Properties.Description: The date after which the court no longer occupied this courthouse.

Properties.Name: Courthouse
Properties.Description: The courthouse that this court used. Courthouses can be any building in which cases are heard, regardless of whether the building's sole function is as a courthouse or whether the building serves many functions.
